meanings.definition: A character or sequence of characters used to separate and distinguish items within a data set.
meanings.sent1: The comma is a common delimiter in CSV files.
meanings.sent2: The delimiter in this dataset is a semicolon.
meanings.sent3: The delimiter decided to take a break from separating data.
meanings.sent4: The delimiter acted like a traffic cop, directing the flow of information.
meanings.sent5: The delimiter is like a gatekeeper, ensuring each item enters the dataset correctly.

meanings.definition: A symbol or character used to mark the beginning or end of a section of text.
meanings.sent1: The quotation marks serve as a delimiter for the dialogue.
meanings.sent2: The delimiter at the end of the paragraph is a period.
meanings.sent3: The delimiter at the start of the story was a bolded word.
meanings.sent4: The delimiter was like a flag signaling the start of a new section.
meanings.sent5: The delimiter is like a bookmark, indicating where the text begins or ends.

meanings.definition: A punctuation mark used to separate elements in a list or series.
meanings.sent1: The colon is a common delimiter in time expressions.
meanings.sent2: The delimiter between the items is a hyphen.
meanings.sent3: The delimiter between the words decided to dance.
meanings.sent4: The delimiter functioned like a gate, allowing only one element through at a time.
meanings.sent5: The delimiter is like a bridge, connecting each element in the list.
